name: Boom Goes The Boat Free
description:
Steer the boat up the river and avoid hitting the river banks. Tap the screen to change the boats direction. The longer you last the fast you go. A challenging fast-paced arcade game that requires great reflexes. Good luck!

+ Tap screen to change directions
+ Don’t hit the river bank
+ Stars slow you down
+ The longer you last the fast you go
+ Simple yet challenging gameplay
